title: Can the Steelers Go 16-0? Plus: Brees vs. Brady, and What Antonio Brown Brings to the Bucs. | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Ryan and Cole are joined by The Ringer’s Kaelen Jones to discuss what to expect from the Pittsburgh Steelers moving forward and whether 16-0 is a legit possibility for them (3:30). Then they talk about Drew Brees and Tom Brady facing off this week and their ability to play at a high level for so long (23:33). After that they talk about Brady’s newest wide receiver—Antonio Brown. Ryan talks about what Brown brings both on and off the field (35:38).
Hosts: Ryan Shazier and Cole Wright
Guest: Kaelen Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
